titles.title: We Will Sing the Songs of Scotland

properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 v2 c2 c2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: We will sing the songs of Scotland Now that we are gathered here We will sing the songs of Scotland, Oh this land we hold so dear

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: Of the Hielan's and the Lowlands, We will sing them all and then Just because we love them, We will sing them all again

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There are stirring, spirit songs of war Where we march the gallant man There are songs of hearth and home Of the mountain and the glen

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There are songs of joy to make us glad And song of sadness too And sweet the songs of love And they all belong to you
